name: PhotoWorks Appearance File
summary: Learn about .P2M files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: P2M files may specify illumination, transparency, or reflection properties. They may also contain textures and repeatable patterns.
Appearances are categorized as textural, procedural, or hybrid.

description: File created by PhotoWorks, a program used to create 2D and 3D images from SolidWorks CAD models; contains an appearance, which is a set of properties that define how the surface of an object is displayed.
